summary: When the world's media descend on the remote Scottish island where a Hollywood actress is attempting to get married, a local girl is hired as a decoy bride to put the paparazzi off the scent.
cast: Danny Bage|Dylan Moran|Hannah Bourne|Michael Urie|Sally Phillips|Alice Eve|David Tennant|Federico Castelluccio|Kelly Macdonald|Maureen Beattie|Muriel Barker|Jeannie Fisher|Hamish Clark|James Fleet|Sally Howitt|Rony Bridges|Matthew Chalmers|Victoria Grove|Alisha Bailey|Patrick Regis|Tina Gray|Gil Kolirin|Ben Addis|William Owen|Calum MacNab|Ross Armstrong|Samuel Roukin|Robert Fyfe|Maryann Turner|Tony Roper|Alex Childs|Achara Kirk|Sean Adames|Ben Bradley|Mike Burnie|Vivienne Harvey|Leo Horsfield|Hugh V. Jamieson|Ken Matthews|Joseph Andrew McLean|Keira McMillan
title: La doble de la novia
